keywords: Digital banking customer churn rates recent
Mobile payment app switching costs analysis
FinTech user experience impact on retention
strategy: The DeepCrawlerAgent will focus on identifying factors influencing buyer power within the FinTech sector. This involves leveraging a tailored set of keywords such as "FinTech customer retention strategies", "digital banking switching costs analysis", "mobile payment app price sensitivity", "consumer FinTech demand trends", and "embedded finance customer expectations" to pinpoint recent market research reports, industry analyses, and consumer surveys. The primary goal is to gather data from the past 6-12 months. The strategy will prioritize uncovering insights into customer segmentation, demand elasticity, loyalty programs, and the ease with which customers can switch between FinTech providers or traditional banking services. The agent will aim to collect quantitative and qualitative data on consumer preferences, pain points, and the perceived value of various FinTech offerings, forming a comprehensive assessment of buyer leverage.
